positions.title: Senior HTML/CSS Interface Developer ( UI Developer )
positions.description:
HTML and CSS development, starting from scratch to full production (according to PSD's)
- HTML5 semantics & CSS3 features,
- Mobile Websites (Liquid Design)
- Responsive Design
- avoiding using images(by using CSS3 effects).
- and using only Sprite Images on websites.
- using LESS, a CSS library.
- Cross Browsing support, +using Modernizr library.
- CSS Re-usability
- Multiple themes via CSS only.
- cut Photoshop PSD's images, and make sprite images when necessary.
- JS/JQuery visual features (like galleries, popups and etc...).

All Links - are websites that i have created HTML+CSS from scratch.

given.text:
It was fantastic to work together with Elad, who was an amazing CSS Architect when we worked together at Walla! NEWS. Elad is always punctual, his knowledge is vast and extensive. Elad leads by example and many developers who worked with him, found his enthusiasm and dedication motivating. Elad was always dedicated and goal oriented that cannot be overestimated. Working with Elad, seeing his passion for CSS was truly inspiring.
â€¦
See more

In the year time i work with Elad i learned that he holds an amazing knowledge base in Front End Development. From a designer's perspective - Elad is a proffesional wet dream, because he's extremely creative and working with him mean almost everything is possible - Give him a design and he will not only find a way to do it - but it would be in the most clean and browser friendly fashion. On a personal level, Elad is also funny, friendly, and has a big heart. i love working with him!
â€¦
